text: Kheun raja teuma di lon lonleumpoe Leumo meuasoe teumbon sileupah Tujoh boh leumo teumbon meurugoh Bandum jipajoh le leumo patah Tujoh boh leumo nyang pijuet-pijuet Abeh jiseukuet leumo be gajah Lom tujoh boh mu gandom nyang ijo Tujoh mu nyang tho teuma meureupah Wahe dum gata ureueng nyang ahli Tapeugah ta‘bi leumpoe lon bagah Meu jeut tapeugah peue taʻbi leumpoe
